topics.body:
"@ParagonCommander":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5474b0c46368727a55bd0300#post_5474b0c46368727a55bd0300
It's cause people like based mom are actually intelligent individuals who value debate; whereas third wavers are based around a meme(I'm using the original definition) that "women are fundamentally opressed unless they're the ones in charge".

The difference the two types in a nutshell using a analogy between the two groups:
"Taking a arrow to the knee didn't actually mean the person literally got shot with a arrow in the knee, but rather it used to be slang for when a man proposed he took a knee and proposed and settled down meaning all those Skyrim guards actually got married and settled down rather than suffering from a injury"
"Le I took a arrow to the knee"

I'm glad there's been so much drama lately, cause it means that people are tired of the overused meme and it's meme backlash going on.

515ddf93a4c72d8a1f000d57

The sad thing is that right now there's a movement to shun intelligence by harassing those in technology fields because intelligence is a threat to their untrue memes that can't hold up to scruitiny.  That's kind of sad when intelligence is legitimately shunned by people for the sake of trying to retain popularity of one's beliefs.
